webscript.description: Creates a derived file association between an output file and a study file. To test: curl -u admin:admin http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/wwarn/createDerivedAssoc?outputFileNodeRef=workspace://SpacesStore/48e0d368-a90d-4692-8c48-8765a80678c0&studyFileNodeRef=workspace://SpacesStore/48e0d368-a90d-4692-8c48-8765a80678c0
